Downloads interactions from the Guide to Pharmacology database

Source: R/guide2pharma.R
guide2pharma_download.Rd

Downloads ligand-receptor interactions from the Guide to Pharmacology (IUPHAR/BPS) database (https://www.guidetopharmacology.org/).

guide2pharma_download()

Value

A tibble (data frame) of interactions as it is provided by the database

Examples

g2p_data <- guide2pharma_download()
g2p_data

#> # A tibble: 21,918 x 38
#>    target           target_id target_gene_symb… target_uniprot target_ensembl_g…
#>    <chr>                <dbl> <chr>             <chr>          <chr>            
#>  1 12S-LOX               1387 ALOX12            P18054         ENSG00000108839  
#>  2 15-LOX-1              1388 ALOX15            P16050         ENSG00000161905  
#>  3 15-LOX-1              1388 ALOX15            P16050         ENSG00000161905  
#>  4 15-LOX-1              1388 ALOX15            P16050         ENSG00000161905  
#>  5 15-LOX-1              1388 ALOX15            P16050         ENSG00000161905  
#>  6 15-LOX-2              1389 ALOX15B           O15296         ENSG00000179593  
#>  7 15-LOX-2              1389 ALOX15B           O15296         ENSG00000179593  
#>  8 3-Mercaptopyruv…      1446 MPST              P25325         ENSG00000128309
